org.linqs.psl.model.rule

Interface Rule

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    UnweightedRule, WeightedRule
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractArithmeticRule, AbstractLogicalRule, AbstractRule, UnweightedArithmeticRule, UnweightedLogicalRule, WeightedArithmeticRule, WeightedLogicalRule

    public interface Rule
    A template for functions that either constrain or measure the compatibility of the values of GroundAtom. A Rule is responsible for instantiating GroundRules. A Rule must instantiate only WeightedGroundRules or only UnweightedGroundRules.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • groundAll

        int groundAll(AtomManager atomManager,
              GroundRuleStore groundRuleStore)
        Adds all GroundRules to a GroundRuleStore using the AtomManager to instantiate ground atoms.
        Parameters:
        atomManager - AtomManager on which to base the grounding
        groundRuleStore - store for new GroundRules
        Returns:
        the number of ground rules generated.

      • isWeighted

        boolean isWeighted()

      • getName

        String getName()

      • supportsGroundingQueryRewriting

        boolean supportsGroundingQueryRewriting()
        Does this rule support rewriting the grounding formual. Rules that do can take advantage of some more advanced grounding techniques. However, they will have to suply their grounding queries as a Formula instead of a raw query. Rules that return true here must also return true for supportsIndividualGrounding().

      • getRewritableGroundingFormula

        Formula getRewritableGroundingFormula(AtomManager atomManager)
        Get a grounding formual that can be rewritten. Should throw if supportsGroundingQueryRewriting() == false.

      • supportsIndividualGrounding

        boolean supportsIndividualGrounding()
        Does this rule support grounding out single instances at a time. Rules that do can take advantage of some more advanced grounding techniques.

      • getGroundingQuery

        RawQuery getGroundingQuery(AtomManager atomManager)
        Get the formual that we can use for grounding. Should throw if supportsIndividualGrounding() == false.

      • ground

        void ground(Constant[] constants,
            Map<Variable,Integer> variableMap,
            AtomManager atomManager,
            List<GroundRule> results)
        Get the formual that we can use for grounding. Should throw if supportsIndividualGrounding() == false.

      • requiresSplit

        boolean requiresSplit()
        Check if this rule needs to be broken up into multiple rules. This may be because of language semantics or performance.

      • split

        List<Rule> split()
        Split this rule into multiple rules. The net effect of all the rules should be the same as the pre-split rule.
